hero.title: Senior UX Expert & Software Engineer
hero.subtitle: Integrating AI, LLMs, and user-centered design into intuitive engineering solutions

positions.title: Senior Product Designer
positions.company: Siemens Digital Industries Software | Milford, OH
bullets: Lead UX design and integration of AI and LLM-driven capabilities into Siemens NX, improving predictive analysis, automated workflows, and user interactions.
Develop agent-driven applications using the Transformers library and OpenAI API for enhanced product manager (PM) productivity and user research knowledge share.
Define product requirements and UX strategies for cloud/web applications, marine, and electrical and mechanical routing solutions.
Create interactive mockups, prototypes, and functional specifications from Figma designs, effectively bridging user-centered design and development processes.
Manage agile product development cycles and facilitate team collaboration for continuous deployment and enhancements.
Automated extraction and rule-based review of user-facing text within Siemens NX via LLM, reducing manual review time over 30% and improving incidence catch rate over 20%.

positions.title: Application Engineer
positions.company: Siemens Digital Industries Software | Milford, OH
bullets: Automated testing procedures across Siemens NX Routing & Assemblies, Teamcenter, and Mentor Graphics Capital, significantly improving product reliability.
Enhanced QA processes and proactively managed stakeholder communications and risks.

positions.title: Engine Design Engineer
bullets: Developed fuel system components meeting high standards for safety, efficiency, and performance.
Collaborated across departments to achieve robust engineering outcomes.
Focus on mechanical design, computational methods, and systems engineering.
Participated in the co-op program, gaining practical experience with industry leaders.
Certified in applying Lean-Agile principles and practices across the enterprise.
Experienced in planning and executing Program Increments within an Agile Release Train.

projectsList.title: Random Roster
projectsList.description: Developed a web application using React and Node.js, enabling educators to manage classes and generate balanced student groups.

subProjects.title: Select Similar Faces and Edges
subProjects.description: Leverages NX’s geometry recognition to quickly find and group faces or edges with similar properties (e.g., planar, cylindrical), saving time on repetitive selection tasks.
subProjects.linkText: Read more in this NX Tips & Tricks blog

subProjects.title: Select Similar Components
subProjects.description: Utilize NX’s selection tools to automatically group similar components in large assemblies for efficient editing.

subProjects.title: NX X Copilot Chat
